facts:

363 - Roman Emperor Julian moves from Antioch with an army of 90,000 to attack the Sassanid Empire, in a campaign which will bring to his own death.

1770 - Boston Massacre: Five Americans, including Crispus Attucks, are killed by British troops in an event that would help start the American Revolutionary War five years later.

1933 - In Germany, the Nazis win 44 percent of the vote in parliamentary elections.

You Are a Super Flirt
You love to flirt, so much so that it gets you in trouble. In almost any situation, you find yourself flirting - even when it's inappropriate. You tend to embrace all flirting styles too.. from coy to sexy to playful to serious. And if someone flirts back, you'll crank it up even more!
What Kind of Flirt Are You?

Things are starting to settle down after last weekends fiasco.  A calm before the storm.  Far from over?  No, I don't think so.  One thing is for certain though after all of this - everyone is even more confused than when we started.  The problem herein lies with the lack of proof.  Maybe its because people are so busy pointing fingers at and trying to kill each other that they forgot to ask the right questions.

As in why did people march to Edsa on the eve of the anniversary of one of our most historical moments?  Why did Gloria decide to declare a state of emergency?  Why did the marines in Fort Bonifacio stage that fiasco of a rebellion?  Why did people go there on the whim of an attention-grabbing colonel?  Why do Filipinos insist on being mindless drones?  Why do we put known rebels in the senate and congress?  Why do we give to the poor only when it suits us?  Why do the poor blame the rich?  Why do the rich blame the poor?  Why do we let the church dictate political decisions and policy?  Why do we go up a feet only to pull ourselves down five more?  Why?  Why?  Why?

If anyone can start answering these and other questions, maybe this country will actually get somewhere.

So the big coup plot bombed out.  So the state of emergency is still in effect.  So there was a big explosion downtown last night maybe somewhere near the vicinity of Malacanang.  So Gloria duped congress and tried to do a makeshift martial law indefinitely.  So everyones paranoid now.  Ah shit, so what else is new?

Coup plots, rallies, state of emergency, martial law.  It's the same old shit.  When will people learn that once was already too much?  And when will the self-righteous idiots realize that the 'masses' are just a bunch of cow being paid to do the work of the political leftists with taxpayer money?  And when will the media actually report real news? (ok, maybe this is hoping too much)

In the last 20 years since we so-called 'proud Filipinos' won our democracy through 'people power', we've actually degenerated into self-pitying, grandstylizing, abusive complaining little media whores.  Yes, the stampede was a horrible accident.  Yes, the leyte tragedy was a disaster.  And yes, Gloria is an idiot (along with everyone else in government).  So what do we do about it?  We commit economic suicide by protesting and holding up the traffic for an entire day, effectively disabling our very short and not-so-prosperous lives.

This, ladies and gents is what we call a conundrum.  I call it shit.  So your life is shitty.  So you don't have work.  So you don't have a house.  So your wife looks like a dogs ass.  Well guess what?  Nobody gives a fuck.  You think people who try to help you give a rats ass what your life is like?  No. All they care about is how good you make them look.  You think your life will improve if you change presidents like you do your underwear? (provided you do have a change of underwear)  No.  Nobody gives a bloody fucking shit.  Deal with it.  If you can't then go kill yourself and stop bothering people who actually try to live.

What does your handwriting say about YOU? The results of your analysis say: You fill every waking moment with activity. You are a shy, idealistic person who does not find it easy to have relationships, especially intimate ones. You are affectionate, passionate, expressive, and future-oriented. You are a talkative person, maybe even a busybody! You enjoy life in your own way and do not depend on the opinions of others.
It's been such a trip this week.

Lately, the world has been spiraling down into a cesspool of fear and terrorism. It makes people feel vulnerable and feeling vulnerable, people tend to act rashly. Take for example the incident in London a few months back and the more recent incident in France. Fear. It is the great divider.

More...

So we had a very long weekend because of the confusing state of affairs we call holidays in this country. It was only prudent that I take a long vacation which involved me diving in some remote island. In this case, it was called Malapascua island.

More

so ya i've started thinking that i would be blogging on a more regular basis.  i'll still be posting and commenting the usual nonsense here on lj but for those who want to read a bit more serious stuff here's the link  - http://boredlog.blogspot.com/  ciao.

There are days when everything just clicks in your head and your surrounding seems so clear.  It's not pleasant, it's not depressing, it's just...clear.  This is one of those days for me.  It's one of those days where you know that every decision you make is right and made without hesitation.  Where you just keep going until the adrenaline fades and you're sitting back and thinking..."God, I wish I had more of these days."

And then it's back to simple old you.

The Hornivore
Random Brutal Sex Master (RBSMm)

Don't ever marry, you're The Hornivore. Roaming, sexual, subhuman.

The Hornivores (you) are some of the most screwed up and naughty beings in the Universe. And their numbers are growing, mostly due to skipped or misused contraception. You care not. There's one thing you want, one sole need.

Half manly, half bestial, you act on instinct, and animal charisma smoothes the way. It's unlikely
Your exact opposite:
The Slow Dancer

Deliberate Gentle Love Dreamer
you're driven by much other than your own selfish, orgasmic requirements. Your appearance and personality have evolved for the hunt. Ass beckons, you oblige.

For the record, you can happily bang all personality types, however your match percentages might be low with the kinder, more sensible people of the world, purely because they all wish to avoid you. Good luck to them.

Melting Polar Ice Caps

this is my favorite part of this post:

"Shrug, Evolution will win in the end. We cannot kill this planet, only ourselves in the end. We could smoke it to the point the whole O-Zone melts like acid, the seas boil and the entire landmass is submerged by melting polar icecaps. She is a tough bitch. She'll be back even if we wont. Some amobeas blob will fuck some protean strain and form another variation of bug eyed life after another countless million year timespan untill we are back where we are.

I'm sure everyone doesn't realize the earths doom is already pre recorded anyway seeing as how one day the sun is going to engulf everything streaching as far back as Saturn one day in one final blaze of HAHAH FUCK YOU ASSHOLES WHERE ARE YOUR GODS NOW glory called a Red Dwarf."

Saturdays are the good and bad of the weekend.  Good because Sunday is a day after and it's my rest day.  Bad because I have to come to the office and still work when I would rather much start enjoying my weekend.  Yes, Saturdays are rarely nice for me these days.  But there are times when I just go loco and say fuck it and leave the office just to go anywhere to chill and waste the time away.  So much for responsible adulthood.  This is one of those days.

fucking call center bastard.  i applied for a cable connection and this is what i get.

CSA: good afternoon this is (mumble, mumble, mumble) too fast to discern
ME: hello, my name is edmund karl yap middle initial s. i applied for sky cable 2 days ago and the installer was here but said he couldn't set a line up coz there was no line for it.  can you help me?

CSA: Sir, ano po concern nila?
ME:  ...

ME:  nandito yung installer niyo sa sky kanina pero ayaw niya kabitan kasi daw lang linya
CSA: Sir, ano po concern nila?

ME: ...(thinking what a fucking retard)
ME:  sabi ng installer nyo wala daw linya ng sky dito pero may home daw kaya pakitanong kung pwede na lang ikabit tutal pareho naman company ng sky at home
CSA:  oo sir, pareho kami ng company

ME: ...
CSA: sir?

ME:  pwede ba pakitanong sa installer kung home na lang ikabit kung pwede?
CSA: di po pwede sir kasi ibang cable yun

ME: ...
ME: diba parehong company ang sky at home? (thinking saying sister company might confuse him more)
CSA: opo sir kaso lang may process po

ME: ...
ME: pwede pakausap ng supervisor?
CSA: sandali lang sir

(5 minutes of dumb music)

CSA: sir?
ME: hmm
CSA: may sabi po ng supervisor ko talaga hong ganun kung gusto niyo pakabit na lang natin home bukas
ME: pakausap na lang ng supervisor
CSA: sandali lang

(5 minutes more)

CSA: sir?
ME: hmm
CSA: sabi ho ng installer hanggang 3rd floor yung home nung dispatch ko
ME: pakausap na lang ng supervisor
CSA: sandali lang

(5 more and more)

CSA: sir?
ME: hmm
CSA: may kausap pa ho yung supervisor
ME: di bale hintayin ko, pakausap na lang supervisor
CSA: sandali lang

(10 minutes)

*click*

at this point, i needed a beer but i resist the urge to slap the nearest person near me
i call again and whatever anyone says, god does have a humor coz this fucktard answered again

CSA: good afternoon, my name is (mumble, mumble, mumble too fast again)
ME: ikaw na naman? ano ulit name mo?
CSA: sir? 
ME: ano name mo?
CSA: donald san jose po

ME: donald ako si mr yap. yung kausap mo kanina
CSA: di po sir marami po kami dito
ME: sige paki tingin nga account ko

CSA: ano ho account number?
ME: la sa kin ngayon pero enter mo last name yap
CSA: edmund ho first name?
ME: yes (fucking idiot)

so ya i didnt tell him my first name this time and the fucktard implicates himself

CSA: sir ano ho concern niyo?
ME: ayaw ko na ulitin, pakausap na lang ng supervisor
CSA: sandali lang

(5 minutes)

CSA: sir, may kausap ho
ME: ok pakisabi sa supervisor mo na kapag di niya ako kinausap sa hr na ako tatawag sunod
CSA: sandali lang

(10 minutes)

*click*

ok i really need a few beers now and start a bar brawl

i get back to my office and call again. only this time a competent person answers and directs me to her supervisor who thankfully addresses all my concerns and intends to reprimand the sonofabitch.  

thank god for small miracles.

i especially like this passage from the bible

"While they were enjoying themselves, the men of the city, a perverse lot, surrounded the house, and started pounding on the door. They said to the old man, the master of the house, "Bring out the man who came into your house, so that we may have intercourse with him." And the man, the master of the house, went out to them and said to them, "No, my brothers, do not act so wickedly. Since this man is my guest, do not do this vile thing. Here are my virgin daughter and his concubine; let me bring them out now. Ravish them and do whatever you want to them; but against this man do not do such a vile thing." But the men would not listen to him. So the man seized his concubine, and put her out to them. They wantonly raped her, and abused her all through the night until the morning. And as the dawn began to break, they let her go. As morning appeared, the woman came and fell down at the door of the man's house where her master was, until it was light.
In the morning her master got up, opened the doors of the hourse, and when he went out to go on his way, there was his concubine lying at the door of the house, with her hands on the threshold. "Get up," he said to her, "we are going." But there was no answer. Then he put her on the donkey, and the man set out for his home. When he had entered his house, he took a knife, and grasping his concubine he cut her into 12 pieces, limb by limb, and sent her pieces throughout all the territory of Israel." --Judges 19:22-29

i give up on trying to understand the higher echelons of our society, the so-called sosyal class.  i can put  up with sensibilities if it was a girl, but if it comes from a friend it really sounds gay.  if you don't like what i'm saying or doing, then punch me or tell me to fuck off.  then let's get into a fistfight and get drunk afterwards.  and i say fuck it to the rules and prissy shit that society dictates.  i'm tired of people telling me what i should be or what i should do.  if you can't take it, then you can fuck off too.

Literally!  I was having beer and nuts after work at a restaurant downtown.  After a couple beers, the peanuts were almost out.  Then I heard a sickening crunch at the back of my mouth and I knew something broke.  I spit out all the remaining contents from my mouth and lo and behold, a piece of my tooth and stone came out.  Now I'm gonna have to get my tooth capped or some shit like that.  SO LOOK AT YOUR FOOD BEFORE YOU PUT IT IN YOUR MOUTH!  It's a nice fuckin' start to my day.

After being drunk for a whole week my nerves are shot and my body is trying to shut down.  I think i'm coming down with something.  Hope it's temporary cause i wanna go diving this weekend.

I suffered an epiphany last week amidst my drunken stupor.  I felt a time of change must come.  So i went out early on Sunday morning, walked into a church (for the first time in many years), and prayed.  Religion still baffles me, but there is one thing that i'm certain of at the moment - there is a God.  

I can't fully explain how this reasoning came about, it's like one of those telegrams that you receive in the  middle of the day that says - God is here. Stop.  Change your life. Stop.  Hmm...maybe i'm still drunk, who knows?

Maybe it's all the karma coming back to haunt me.  Ah well, life moves on and i'm still dumb enough not to notice.

"I'm givin' it all shes got Cap'n, I can'na give ya no more!"  If this sounds familiar to you, then you should realize this is a famous line from the engineer in the classic tv series Star Trek.  Yes, Scotty is dead, he died in his sleep last night at age 85.  I don't know about you guys, but he was my favorite character in Star Trek, only cause he had that cool fake scottish accent.

If you are a Harry Potter fan (or even if you weren't), book 6 'The Half-Blood Prince' is a must-read.  Of course, you'd have to have been following the previous 3 books before it because the story really begins there.  The series is finally coming full-circle and those of you who wondered about the unanswered questions or the tiny details that you thought were unimpressive since 'The Sorcerer's Stone' will come to slowly realize that J.K Rowling had perhaps the entire storyline all thought out till the end.

We all knew that the series was getting more mature as it went along and the characters grew older year-by-year, and the 6th installation doesn't fail expectations.  It is perhaps the most emotional of all the books, building up to the climax that is book 7.  Without giving out too much for those that haven't read it yet, Harrys all grown-up and he realizes after all, that he never should have been a child to begin with.

I can't wait to get my hands on the last book!
Got a new wetsuit today!  I'm excited to try it out now.

Dating is such a mundane task.  First, you have to set up the date, talk about random stuff, feel out the person as you trudgingly go through the date and then think about the 2nd date (if there is one) in almost the same manner.

One thing that I realized though after having gone through alot of trial and error, is that a 3rd person point of view is always a good way to learn from your mishaps.  Its probably best not to overanalyze your date though, as these things tend to backfire.  As such, the concept of dating could be, simply put, go with what works for you and just forget about the trash.

Mondays.  I detest Mondays.  We should all take a break on Monday so we don't have to put up with the anxiety it provides every week.  Somehow the grand universe has conspired in order to make Monday the crappiest day of the week.  I guess it fits in the principle of alchemy, that once you take something you must give back in equal amounts.  Party on Friday and Saturday night and chillax on Sunday, then comes Monday.  Shitty Monday.

I haven't had much to type about these past couple of weeks, nothing interesting is really happening.  Aside from sitting in the office and watching too many videos on my pc, scratching my ass from time to time and wondering what the hell I'm gonna be cooking for dinner, life is just peachy.

Outside the world is going the same way it has been for the last millenia or so - political turmoil, economic downtrend, mass murder, terrorism (which in the old days were either called the crusades or the final solution to the jewish question), and of course my favorite, metro manila traffic.

It makes me wonder if we, as a species, have come full-circle at long last - from idiots to masters of the world back to idiots.  I know, I know, it's harsh but evolution really must have been high when it decided to put human beings on top of the food chain.

At this point, the only sure way we can save ourselves is to put every new born babe on an isolated island, leave robots to teach them about history and everything else and hope they don't turn out like us.

And the world turns...

A writer can write, a genius can create.  This is what Stephen King has done in his Dark Tower series - a society with its own terms which, for lack of a better word, seem to sound and mean better than our own.  Take this sentence for example: "I can be your friend if it does ya.", which sounds more noble than "I can be your friend if it's ok.", which sounds a bit pathetic.

This is the consequence of reading a novel that sucks you in.  Eventually, you speak like that in real life and people go "wha...?".  Anyway, if you haven't read the Dark Tower series yet, I highly recommend it.
